basic_operations: sink("path\filename.txt", split=TRUE) # Sends output to both console and file
data_structures: matrix(data, nrow, ncol) # Create a matrix
data.frame(col1, col2) # Create a data frame
data[row, col] # Access rows and columns
data_manipulation: apply(matrix, 1, sum) # Apply sum across rows
text_processing: nchar(string) # Number of characters in a string
substr(string, start, stop) # Extract part of a string
graphics: hist(data, breaks="FD", freq=FALSE) # Histogram with density
statistical_functions: lm(y ~ x, data=data) # Linear regression model
dnorm(x), pnorm(x), qnorm(p), rnorm(n) # Normal distribution functions
